name: HomeConnectDishwasher
0:
”Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to start the Normal program.”
”Alexa, ask My Dishwasher for status.”
”Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to run the Glass program with half load in two hours.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my dishwasher
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill, you can control and monitor the most important functions of your dishwasher, such as starting a program or asking when your dishes will be ready.

Features:
* Use any programs and options your dishwasher provides. Just say a program and up to three options to start your dishwasher immediately, or set a delayed start.
* Decide on subject of information that you expect to receive Alexa Notifications about: program is finished, low rinse aid / salt level or action needed.
* You can also ask for the dishwasher's status at any time.
* Make the washing cycle up to three times faster by activating the Speed on Demand option. You can shorten the program at any time, even when the rinse cycle is up and running. Find the settings in the Home Connect app.
* Reduce the noise level to a minimum for up to 30 minutes using the Silence on Demand function. Find the settings in the Home Connect app.
* Use your dishwasher in Alexa routines: turn your dishwasher on or off, start a program, or activate the Silence on Demand function.
* Get notified when your dishwasher tabs are running low and you want to reorder new tabs with smart reorders via the Alexa app.
* Enter assist mode without launching the skill first ("Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to assist").
* Turn your dishwasher on and off.
* Support of visual content and touch interaction on Echo Show devices.

Selection of supported commands:
"Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to start the Normal degrees programme"
"Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to start the Auto programme with vario speed"
"Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to start"
"Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to run with half load"
"Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to run Heavy in 2 hours"
"Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to start my favorite program"
"Alexa, tell My Dishwasher to stop beeping"
"Alexa, ask My Dishwasher to turn on"
"Alexa, ask My Dishwasher to turn off"
"Alexa, ask My Dishwasher for its status"
"Alexa, ask My Dishwasher when the dishes will be ready"
"Alexa, ask My Dishwasher to start Silence on Demand"
"Alexa, ask My Dishwasher to speed up"

Further tips:
* You can tell your dishwasher to start without specifying a program. If the dishwasher is on, it will start the currently selected program. If it's off, it will turn on and use your default program.
* If you have any issues with the skill, please try re-enabling it.
* In order to use this skill, you need to link your Home Connect account to Alexa. You can register an account in the Home Connect app. Please also make sure that you pair your dishwasher with the Home Connect app.
* This skill supports dishwasher models with Home Connect from Bosch, Siemens, Neff, Gaggenau, Thermador, Constructa, Balay, Profilo and Pitsos. Please check the local availability of the appliance brand.

Please be aware that the skill might not support all home appliance features as available in the Home Connect app. We are continuously working on new version releases to improve and enrich the skill experience. If you have any questions or comments regarding the skill, please send them to the email address below.

Contact and feedback:
For more information about the Home Connect skills please visit: www.home-connect.com/alexa
Visit www.home-connect.com/amazon-smart-reorders to learn how to set up smart reorders in the Alexa app
In case you have questions or comments, just send an email to service.us@home-connect.com

Your Home Connect Team
